    • Uses of Engine in ray.rage.game

      Methods in ray.rage.game that return Engine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Engine Game.getEngine()
      Gets the game's reference to the engine and allows it to access its functionality.
      Engine BaseGame.getEngine() 
      Methods in ray.rage.game with parameters of type Engine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void VariableFrameRateGame.run(Engine engine) 
      protected abstract void AbstractGame.run(Engine engine)
      Enters the main loop.
      protected abstract void AbstractGame.setupScene(Engine engine, SceneManager sm)
      This is where the game sets up a scene by creating entities, lights, and other scene-objects.
      protected void BaseGame.shutdown(Engine engine) 
      protected abstract void AbstractGame.shutdown(Engine engine)
      Shuts down the game and then the engine, in that order.
      protected void BaseGame.startup(Engine engine) 
      protected abstract void AbstractGame.startup(Engine engine)
      Starts up the engine and then the game, in that order.
      protected abstract void AbstractGame.update(Engine engine)
      Allows the game to perform all necessary updates prior to rendering a frame.

    • Uses of Engine in ray.rage.scene

      Methods in ray.rage.scene with parameters of type Engine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Tessellation.removeHeightMap(Engine eng)
      Removes the texture currently being used on the tessellation as a height map, and replaces it with the default texture default.png.
      void Tessellation.removeNormalMap(Engine eng)
      Removes the texture currently being used on the tessellation as a normal map, and replaces it with the default texture default.png.
      void Tessellation.removeTexture(Engine eng)
      Removes the texture currently being used on the tessellation, and replaces it with the default texture default.png.
      void Tessellation.setHeightMap(Engine eng, java.lang.String texPath)
      Sets the specified texture onto the tessellation as a height map.
      void Tessellation.setNormalMap(Engine eng, java.lang.String texPath)
      Sets the specified texture onto the tessellation as a normal map.
      void Tessellation.setTexture(Engine eng, java.lang.String texPath)
      Sets the specified texture onto the tessellation.
